metadata.title: CVE-2018-12016 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libephymain.so in GNOME Web (aka Epiphany) through 3.28.2.1 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via certainwindow.open and document.write calls.

criterions.comment: epiphany-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
